name: Like me if you like this article
author: Mayo Moriyama

sections.description:
Description

It will insert Facebook page like button with Japanese viral marketing style.
Add the button on the bottom of every single article where is the easiest position for calling action!

Based idea

Our code & idea is based on the article “FacebookページいいねやTwitterフォロワーが倍増！バイラルメディア風オリジナルSNSボタンの設置方法【WordPress】” by Manashiba aka mama blogger.

Developers information

It’s being developed on the GitHub.
If you find some bugs, confliction with some themes or plugins or would like to suggest or contribute, let us know as GitHub Issues.
sections.installation:
Basic Setting

  1. Upload this folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
  3. Set your Facebook and Twitter account through the Option>Reading menu in WordPress.

How to display Facebook Like box

  1. If you want to display Facebook Like box, fill out Facebook page id through the Option > Reading menu in WordPress.
  2. If you don’t want to display Facebook Like box, leave it blank with Facebook page id through the Option > Reading menu in WordPress.

How to display Twitter follow box

  1. If you want to display Twitter follow box, fill out Twitter account through the Option>Reading menu in WordPress.
  2. If you want to Add your name on Twitter follow box, fill out Twitter display name through the Option>Reading menu in WordPress.
  3. If you don’t want to display Twitter follow box, leave blank with Twitter account through the Option > Reading menu in WordPress.

short_description: This will recommend to like any Facebook page on the bottom of every single article.
